coverage: This demo showcases Amazon.ca's homepage exploration, searching, refining results, and viewing product details. Users can navigate easily, finding diverse products with helpful filters and quick actions.
assumptions: Basic website functionality and internet connection availability.
Users are familiar with online shopping concepts and navigation.
risks: Some website elements might have dynamic IDs, causing issues with selectors.
Limited time to thoroughly explore; assumes users are comfortable with online shopping platforms.

segments.text: Welcome to Amazon.ca, Canada's largest online retailer. Here, we have easy access to numerous products. Notice the handy keyboard shortcuts and the location updater. Let's dive into the diverse categories.
Let's search for something specific - say, 'laptops'. We can refine our search with handy filters, sorting by price or other specs. It's easy to navigate and find what we need.
Check out this detailed view of a laptop. We see customer ratings, reviews, and quick actions. It's simple to add items to our cart or view more product details.
